casebody.data:
Office of Disciplinary Counsel v. Grove.

[Cite as Disciplinary Counsel v. Grove (2000), 90 Ohio St.3d 312.]

(No. 00-1146 Submitted August 22, 2000 Decided November 15, 2000.) *313Jonathan E. Coughlan, Disciplinary Counsel, for relator. Victor A. Hodge, for respondent. Per Curiam.

We adopt the findings, conclusions, and recommendation of the board. We hereby publicly reprimand respondent and tax costs to him.

Judgment accordingly.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
